who.desc: Literally tells who they really are lol.
who.user_string:
I just want to take this moment to be thankful to him.

He has already devoted his life for me.
He's a peaceful USER.☺️
who.god_string:
I assure you, he CANNOT get better than this.

He is already a GOD.🤩🤩
who.nobody_string:
The harsh truth of this twisted reality is,

he is a NOBODY.😢
who.usage: If used as a reply to someone's message, you get to know who they are. Else, I will tell you what society really thinks of you. !whoami That's it.😊

notify.desc: Send a notification to all subscribers.
notify.usage: Command must be a reply to some message.

rate.desc: Give YOUR rating to a movie you watched.
rate.usage: Command must be a reply to some message. Rating must be on a scale of (0,10]. !rate your_rating

add.desc: Add a movie to the database
add.usage: Requires GOD privilige. Refernced message must be in proper format, so that title and other details can be extracted

sub.success_message: 😱😱😱 You might have just made one the biggest decisions of your life. Welcome to the cult.🥳🥳 AND Thanks for not being mean to me.❤️❤️❤️

start.desc: You will recieve notifications from me
start.usage: You need to be a subscriber furst.

stop.desc: You will NOT recieve notifications from me
stop.usage: You need to be a subscriber furst.

suggest.desc: Suggest a movie to add to our epic collection.

promote.usage: Command must be a reply to someone's message. Usage: !promote
